name: Repetition of Demolition
description:
---A game made in 48 hours for the GM48 game jam---
--The theme was Falling Apart---

A Room Escape style puzzler, inspired by games like Monkey Island and Outer Wilds.

You've been trapped in a cage in the bad guy's lair. With your superhero strength you can get out, but the alarm system triggers a countdown which sends you back in time. Only solution is to stop the timer somehow before the time runs out. Game progresses through knowledge gained through exploration.

Hints start appearing on game overs (by time limit) after 5 resets.

Any feedback is greatly appreciated! Thanks for playing!

--Controls--

Left/Right: Move      Z: Jump        Z + Down: Jump down       X: Pick up/ Throw upwards 
Up: Enter doors        R: Restart escape         Esc: Toggle Fullscreen
